newsitem.title: SPAIN: Tabacalera receives bids for Intabex stake.
newsitem.headline: Tabacalera receives bids for Intabex stake.

text.p: Spain's Tabacalera said on Thursday it had received offers for its 31.8 percent stake in Intabex Holding Worldwide, the holding company which controls Tabacos de Filipinas.
"We have received offers for our 31.8 percent stake in Intabex," a Tabacalera spokesman told Reuters in response to local press reports.

Spanish financial daily Cinco Dias reported on Thursday that Tabacalera was in talks with a North American group for the sale of Tobacos de Filipinas. It suggested that US Dimon Inc could be the other side of the talks.
The remaining 68 percent stake in Intabex is owned by a private family, Taberer.
